title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. C, pt. 324 - Medical Treatment Guidelines
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. C, pt. 324 - Medical Treatment Guidelines

State Regulations
§ 324.1 - Definitions
§ 324.2 - Medical treatment guidelines
§ 324.3 - Variances (PAR: MTG Variances)
§ 324.4 - PARs confirming consistency with MTG or medical necessity when no MTG
§ 324.5 - Conditions, treatments, or diagnostic tests not addressed by medical treatment guidelines
§ 324.6 - Incorporation into policies, procedures and practices

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. C, pt. 324

Statutory authority: Workers' Compensation Law, §§ 13, 13-a, 13-b, 13-k, 13-l, 13-m, 117, 141

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
